data.name: Nemezis: Mysterious Journey III Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Created by award-winning artist Paweł Górniak. Winner of the Hollywood Music in Media Award and composer of Fish Night episode's music of the Love, Death & Robots series.
Instrumental, relaxing, kind of background sounds. Perfect for studying, reading, RPG sessions, board games.
data.about_the_game:
Created by award-winning artist Paweł Górniak. Winner of the Hollywood Music in Media Award and composer of Fish Night episode's music of the Love, Death & Robots series.

data.short_description: Music from the game Nemezis: Mysterious Journey.
